properties.name: zap.whatsapp.apiKey
properties.description: API key for the WhatsApp integration used to trigger caregiver notifications.

properties.name: zap.whatsapp.telefone
properties.description: Fallback phone number used when WhatsApp notifications are triggered without an explicit recipient.

properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret used to sign Senior+ JWT tokens; provide a secure value via the environment.

properties.name: jwt.expiration-minutes
properties.description: Default token lifetime in minutes for Senior+ JWT tokens.
